abouts.title: Innovating the Future, One Solution at a Time
abouts.subtitle: About Us
abouts.description: Early Tech is a visionary IT solutions company dedicated to transforming ideas into reality. We specialize in software development, UI/UX design, digital transformation, and business automation, helping businesses scale and innovate. Our team thrives on creativity, collaboration, and cutting-edge technology to deliver seamless and impactful solutions. At Early Tech, your vision is our mission!

abouts1.title: Pioneering Digital Excellence with Early Tech
abouts1.subtitle: Who We Are
abouts1.description: At Early Tech, we are more than just a tech companyâ€”we are innovators, problem solvers, and digital transformation partners. Our expertise spans software development, AI-driven solutions, and cloud-based automation, empowering businesses to stay ahead in a rapidly evolving world. We believe in creating technology that simplifies, accelerates, and enhances business operations with a futuristic approach.

abouts2.title: Driving Innovation, Delivering Success
abouts2.subtitle: Our Mission
abouts2.description: Early Tech is on a mission to redefine how technology fuels business growth. By blending strategy, design, and execution, we create intelligent solutions that drive efficiency, scalability, and success. Whether it's building cutting-edge applications or automating workflows, our goal is to turn every challenge into an opportunity for innovation.

services.sectionDescription: We provide high-quality development services to help your business grow faster.

list.title: Mobile Development
list.description: We craft high-performance, user-friendly mobile applications tailored for iOS and Android. Our solutions focus on seamless UI/UX, scalability, and cutting-edge technology to deliver engaging and efficient mobile experiences.

list.title: Back-end Development
list.description: We build secure, scalable, and high-performance backend systems that power seamless digital experiences. Our expertise in APIs, databases, and cloud solutions ensures reliable and efficient data management.

list.title: Front-end Development
list.description: We create responsive, interactive, and visually stunning user interfaces that enhance digital experiences. Using the latest technologies, we ensure seamless performance, accessibility, and a user-friendly design across all devices.

list.title: AI Development
list.description: We harness the power of Artificial Intelligence to build smart, data-driven solutions that enhance automation, decision-making, and efficiency. From machine learning models to AI-powered chatbots, we create intelligent systems that drive innovation.

works.title: WORKS
works.subTitle: Our Works
works.description: At Early Tech, we craft innovative digital solutions that solve real-world challenges. From education and charity platforms to business and management systems, our work drives impact across industries. Explore our diverse projects designed for efficiency, growth, and seamless user experience.

workItems.title: Devkirti Charitable Foundation
workItems.subTitle: Empowering Social Change
workItems.description: A digital platform designed to support social initiatives and charitable programs. Streamlines donation processes for easy and secure contributions. Enhances community engagement with interactive features and updates. Provides transparency with real-time impact tracking and reports. Aiming to create a larger social impact through technology.

workItems.title: Hydro Care Innovation
workItems.subTitle: Revolutionizing Industrial Solutions
workItems.description: A professional website showcasing industrial chemical solutions. Highlights RO chemicals, boiler chemicals, and water treatment innovations. Designed for B2B clients, ensuring easy product discovery and inquiries. Provides essential resources, safety guidelines, and application insights. Enhancing industry standards with modern technology integration.

workItems.title: School Management System (CRM Module)
workItems.subTitle: Simplifying Education Management
workItems.description: A powerful school management platform automating administration, attendance, and academic tracking. Role-based dashboards for students, teachers, and admins ensure seamless communication and efficiency, enhancing the overall learning experience. Integrated real-time notifications and reports keep everyone informed and connected.

workItems.title: Visitor Management System
workItems.subTitle: Secure and Efficient Check-ins
workItems.description: A modern system for managing visitors efficiently and securely. Enables quick check-ins with digital registration and verification processes. Stores visitor logs with real-time tracking for enhanced security. Integrates with access control and notification systems. Designed to improve visitor experience while maintaining organizational safety.

workItems.title: B2B Business Solutions
workItems.subTitle: Connecting Vendors and Retailers
workItems.description: A digital platform bridging wholesalers, vendors, and retailers. Simplifies order management, inventory tracking, and payments. Offers an intuitive dashboard for seamless transactions and stock updates. Enhances efficiency with automated invoicing and order fulfillment. Supports business growth by streamlining the entire supply chain.

faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs)
faqs.howToGetSupport: How can I get technical support?
faqs.responseTime: What is the response time for queries?
faqs.liveSupport: Can I schedule a live support session?

answers.howToGetSupport: You can email us at support@earlytech.com or call our helpline during business hours.
answers.responseTime: We usually respond within 24-48 hours for standard queries. Critical issues are prioritized.
answers.liveSupport: Yes, you can book a live support session via email. Our team will coordinate a suitable time.

privacyStatement.title: Privacy Statement
privacyStatement.subtitle: Your Privacy Matters
privacyStatement.introduction: We are committed to protecting your privacy. This statement outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard your personal information.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.description: We collect information such as your name, email address, and usage data to provide and improve our services.

dataUsage.title: Data Usage
dataUsage.description: Your data is used to personalize your experience, improve our services, and communicate with you.

faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.answer1: Your data is stored securely using industry-standard encryption and security measures.
faqs.answer2: Yes, you can request the deletion of your data at any time by contacting us.
faqs.question3: Is my data shared with third parties?
faqs.answer3: We do not share your data with third parties without your explicit consent.

termsOfUse.title: Terms of Use
termsOfUse.subtitle: Acceptable Use Policy
termsOfUse.introduction: By using our services, you agree to comply with these terms. Please read them carefully to understand your rights and responsibilities.

userResponsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
userResponsibilities.description: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and for all activities that occur under your account.

prohibitedActivities.title: Prohibited Activities
prohibitedActivities.description: You may not use our services for any illegal or unauthorized purpose, including but not limited to hacking, spamming, or distributing malware.

faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.question1: What happens if I violate the terms?
faqs.answer1: Violations may result in the suspension or termination of your account.
faqs.question2: Can I transfer my account to someone else?
faqs.answer2: No, accounts are non-transferable and must be used only by the registered user.
faqs.answer3: You can report abuse by contacting our support team at support@example.com.
